How to check out using SVN?

===It's easy! Just 6 steps!===
*Steps:*
 # Go to [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN] to download the lastest version of TortoiseSVN, and install it after downloaded.
 # Create a new folder anywhere you like which will be used to check out the repository.
 # Right click on the folder, and choose "SVN Checkout".
 # Copy and paste https://studybuddy-triplethreat.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ in the "URL of repository" field, and then click "OK".
 # Enter your google username with the complete email(e.g, vkao@sfu.ca), and for the password, go to "http://code.google.com/hosting/settings". Use the "*{{{GoogleCode.com Password}}}*" as the password.
 # Finally, click "OK". Congraulations! You are now done the check-out!
